definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: So the number of types of aioli is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 因此蒜泥蛋黃醬的種類將是無窮無盡的。

sentences.english: I declare that the Library is endless.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，這座圖書館是無窮無盡的。
“這些衛星的可能性是無窮無盡的，”西格爾說。

sentences.english: The infinite nature of the puzzle keeps the fun alive in his work.
sentences.chinese: 無窮無盡的謎題讓他保持着對工作的樂趣。

sentences.english: That’s the truth, Max, they never end. That keyboard is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 事實如此，無窮無盡，鍵盤無限大。

sentences.english: I shall die again and again to know that life is inexhaustible.
sentences.chinese: 爲了弄明白生是無窮無盡的，我將萬死不辭。

sentences.english: Keren, the total seems to have endless trouble.
sentences.chinese: 可人，總好像有無窮無盡的煩惱。

sentences.english: The world, just as it is, has endless gifts to offer.
sentences.chinese: 世界就像它本身一樣，有無窮無盡的禮物要饋贈。

sentences.english: Our love for the dogs, cats, and fish in our lives truly knows no bounds.
sentences.chinese: 我們對於貓狗魚的愛真的是無窮無盡。

sentences.english: The possibilities of spinoff technologies are endless.
sentences.chinese: 它衍生的科技用途將無窮無盡。

sentences.english: Because the Grab Bar ends pivot and rotate, the installation options are endless.
sentences.chinese: 因爲擒抱杆兩端軸和旋轉，安裝選項是無窮無盡的。

sentences.english: Endlessly varied art thou In the exuberant world, Lady of Manifold Magnificence.
sentences.chinese: 大千世界裏，你無窮無盡地變幻，華麗多姿的姑娘。

sentences.english: It is an infinite debt, which one can only be charged through all eternity.
sentences.chinese: 這筆債無窮無盡，只有相守到永遠才能償還。

sentences.english: The creative power of the masses knows no limits.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆的創造力是無窮無盡的。
如此導致了無窮無盡的無端區分。

sentences.english: Compare with endless endless black Jiao, he is our biggest threat.
sentences.chinese: 跟無窮無盡的黑蛟相比，他纔是我們最大的威脅。

definition: to turn over/to surge/to churn/to rummage/raging (torrent)
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
